name: Baldi's Basics But like Plus
description:
Play Baldi's Basics with some features from Baldi's Basics Plus. No more having to wait 9830589348934 years for the final release of Baldi's Basics Plus. (or if so paid forever). 

It is recommended you buy Baldi's Basics Plus from these links to get the most features from the original plus game

Don't play this mod if you already have Baldi's Basics Plus

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1275890/Baldis_Basics_Plus/

https://basically-games.itch.io/baldis-basics-plus

What this mod has is

  • The Tape Vending Machine. Not just 1 Baldi's Anti Hearing Tape. But you can insert a quarter to the Tape machine. It is found in one of the faculty rooms.
  • Zesty bar vending machine in the Cafeteria. No more having to get one in one of the faculty rooms to just have a chance to get caught by the principal.
  • Vending machine sounds when you insert a quarter to it
  • Hide-and-Seek and Endless Hide-and-Seek
  • New Principal Voicelines
  • Baldi's Oh hi. Let's play hide and seek voiceline
  • Kickstarter backers who donated $500 Posters in one of the rooms
  • Baldi's new You need to Collect 2 Notebooks voiceline

Upcoming features

  • New secret ending. Without null
  • Elevators (if possible)
  • New staminometer from Baldi's Basics Plus and Baldi's Basics Classic Remastered. however there will be no blue line when i add this

Any people who like to cry about this being uploaded to itch.io. I will keep this up no matter what. You can atleast buy Baldi's Basics Plus so you can move on from this if you are gonna complain about this being up

And yes. It has math yctp because Baldi's Basics Classic teaches math by answering the questions. So this mod may kinda be confusing

Due to legal reasons. There will be no level generators and seeds. Math machines

Mod by Fusuagoaha
